titles.title: Recycling Investment Saves Energy
RISE Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code to allow a special depreciation allowance for reuse and recycling property.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/12/2008--Introduced. Recycling Investment Saves Energy or the RISE Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a first-year tax deduction of 50% of the adjusted basis of qualified reuse and recycling property. Defines "qualified reuse and recycling property" as property placed in service after December 31, 2006, which has a useful life of at least five years and which is used exclusively to collect, distribute, or recycle certain scrap materials.
